name: Spider Problem
description:
I recommend using the standalone version to minimize the amount of bugs

The web player does not work on chrome. Please use another browser or download the standalone version.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Save the city or turn it to ashes, who cares.

Shoot, punch, stomp and destroy everything. Saw the avengers recently? Well you can fly just like Iron Man and take down buildings while doing it. Recreate terrible moments of history by giving planes a tilt and set them on their way to a certain death, or make them explode yourself by flying right through.

Behead a big guy, wow! Can you destroy the mayor's indestructible ball? What horrors lie beyond the city's limits? Find out in this crazy little game.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

I really love to read your comments, good or bad. Tell me what you think or share your ideas and suggestions, there are no rules yet so let's get crazy.

Just fun.

You can also follow/contact me at http://neetdev.tumblr.com/

(the submarine game will get some love soon don't worry)
